TEXT.TITLE: WEIRTON STEEL CORP 3RD QTR
TEXT.BODY:
Net 33.6 mln vs 11.1 mln
    Revs 319.6 mln vs 295.1 mln
    Nine mths

    Net amounts reported are before taxes, profit sharing, and
contribution to employee stock ownership trust.
